item.description:
Is anyone going for the ForSE Social Entrepreneurship Conference? I've just registered, and would love to meet-up with others from the group.

 

Confirmed speakers include:

- Dr. Harish Hande, Selco India. Magasaysay Award winner for 2011

- Andrew Yang, Venture for America

- Dave Perry, Founder/CEO, Osmopure

- Akhil Nigam, Co-founder and President, Masschallenge

- Lawino Kagumba, Zana Africa

- Sam White, Founder, Greentown Labs

 

Hope to see some of you soon.This promises to be a great event for those interested in international development, social entrepreneurship, or just the non-profit sector in general.

Cheers!

Jacob

 

PS: Early bird prices range between $10 and $40. Event day registration is $100, so sign up now if you plan to come.
item.name: ForSE 2011: Conference for Social Enterpreneurs
